messages.title: A contract between Flick Drummond and the people of Portsmouth South
messages.content: For a strong and effective MP who will be accountable to you, vote for Flick Drummond on 7th May

messages.title: My Commitment
messages.content: As your Member of Parliament, I will not take on any other paid roles... If elected on 7th May, I will be a strong and effective Member of Parliament, accountable to you.

issues.economy: I will campaign to bring a range of businesses and investment into the city to create new quality jobs and industries to provide different jobs so we are not dependent on a few large employers.
issues.education: I will work hard to improve standards in our schools. Education is key to the life chances of our young people...
issues.health: We work towards a better access to hospitals near me. Improved access to GPs and minor injury units so that emergency departments are not swamped... I will work with local health providers to improve our NHS so that people can get a timely appointment and treatment.

leaflet.personalStatement: Flick has lived in Portsmouth for 8 years... Flick is a trustee of the Citizens Advice Bureau and helps your vulnerable people...

politicalExperience.achievements: Helping deliver a good education at this inner-city school.

politicalExperience.role: Trustee of the Citizens Advice Bureau

images.caption: Pompey Litter Pickers was set up by Flick in response to complaints about rubbish on our estates
